page.title: 04A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: WEDNESDAY 29th MAY ANGELA'S DAY 07.00 got up washed and had breakfast 07.25 took the dog for a walk 07.45 switched on the television 08.00 Dad went to work Mum got up 08.25 left for school 09.00 school bell rang started work 09.45 Gym relay race practice 10.30 playtime 10.45 division of fractions 12.10 lunch 13.30 school resumes 13.45 Sports started 2nd in Cricket Ball Throwing,3rd in High Jump,Flat Race,Egg and Spoon ,1st Girls Relay, 1st Threelegged:Runner-up to Champion 15.20 went home 17.00 had tea went out to play 18.30 came in to watch football 19.30 had bath washed hair 20.00 still watching football from Brussels 41 died horrible 22.30 went to bed
